abilities.description: If a creature dies while you Sneak Attack them, you may turn Invisible until you attack again or until the beginning of your next turn.

abilities.name: Leave No Trace
abilities.description: Advantage on Stealth checks when you are at full health.

abilities.name: Cunning Strike
abilities.description: (2/encounter) When you land a Sneak Attack, you may force the target to make a STR save (DC 10+INT). On a failure, instead of rolling your Sneak Attack dice, they deal the maximum amount of damage (if your target saves, regain 1 use).

abilities.name: Professional Skulker
abilities.description: Gain a climbing speed and advantage on Stealth checks (replaces Leave No Trace).

abilities.name: KILL
abilities.description: When you crit an enemy with fewer max HP than you, it dies.
